backend/main.mo: Defines video, user, comment, reaction, and post types with maps for storage, plus access-controlled methods for registering posts, liking them, and retrieving profiles and post data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to related files, components, and test IDs for preloader and routing behavior changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of many frontend files describing their roles in layout, navigation, pages, video feed, creation tools, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and applying base styles for background, text, and borders.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the app root and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app entry configuring TanStack Router, app routes, theme provider, and always showing the animated preloader on fresh load.
Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wrapper that blocks access when unauthenticated and shows a login prompt or fallback component.
frontend/src/components/create/CameraRec: Camera recording component using MediaRecorder and useCamera hook to capture video or fall back to upload on errors.
frontend/src/components/create/CaptureOr: Handles capturing video/photo, recording, text-to-image generation, or file uploads before passing a File to the next step.
frontend/src/components/create/CreationF: Manages the multi-step creation flow including mode selection, capture, editing, and preview stages.
frontend/src/components/create/editor/Du: Renders a side-by-side duet of the source video and the user's video.
frontend/src/components/create/editor/Ed: Displays the media during editing with support for playback control, captions, stickers, and basic interactions.
frontend/src/components/create/editor/to: Generates automatic cut segments based on a sensitivity threshold and updates editor state with resulting segments.
Provides UI to add, remove, and adjust captions including text and size adjustments.
Lets users apply or toggle visual effects, replacing the current effect list with the selected effect.
Allows selecting a single visual filter by toggling between predefined filter options.
Enables uploading, previewing, and clearing a background image for green screen replacement.
Manages music selection, uploads, and volume controls for original and added audio tracks.
Presents predefined playback speeds and updates the editor state when one is selected.
Supports adding preset stickers to the canvas and removing previously added stickers.
Provides a slider to adjust trim start and end positions and updates the editor state accordingly.
Provides UI and logic for recording, clearing, and applying effects to a voiceover in the editor.
frontend/src/components/create/editor/To: Main tool selector panel that displays available editing tools and renders the active tool’s UI based on user selection.
frontend/src/components/create/EditorSte: Loads media, manages editor state, and triggers video rendering before moving to the preview step.
frontend/src/components/create/ModeSelec: Displays mode selection buttons for creating video, photo, or text content.
frontend/src/components/create/PreviewSt: Shows a preview of the rendered output and handles title input and publishing the video.
frontend/src/components/create/UploadFal: Provides a drag-and-drop or manual file picker UI for uploading video files.
frontend/src/components/create/VideoPrev: Simple component for loading and displaying a video preview with controls.
frontend/src/components/feed/VerticalVid: Renders a vertically scrolling video feed and tracks which video is active using IntersectionObserver.
Defines the main app layout with header, content area, footer, and bottom tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Renders bottom navigation tabs and highlights the active route using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/preloader/FirstL: Displays a timed animated ZIZO logo sequence on first launch before fading out.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Modal for profile editing placeholder, currently showing disabled profile picture upload.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Shows a required onboarding modal for new authenticated users to set their display name.
frontend/src/components/video/CommentsMo: Dialog that displays video comments, allows posting new comments, and handles auth validation.
frontend/src/components/video/Interactio: Provides interactive buttons for liking, commenting, reacting, following, sharing, and dueting on a video.
frontend/src/components/video/ShareModal: Modal for sharing videos via Web Share API or copying a generated share link.
Displays a video with play/pause behavior, double‑tap liking, and an interaction bar.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoPoste: Shows a placeholder image and loading overlay while a video is loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDoubleTap.ts: Detects double‑tap gestures using timing between taps.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for videos, trending, likes, uploads, profiles, comments, and reactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useTapGestures.ts: Handles single‑tap and double‑tap gestures with timers and callbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom theme variables, layout utilities, and preloader styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AndroidIiLoginPage.ts: Android-specific login page handling Internet Identity auth, redirecting to the app and showing success or error states.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePage.tsx: Create page requiring authentication and launching the video creation flow with optional duet support.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home feed page that loads and displays videos or shows loading/error/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Static notifications page showing an empty state with a header.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile page showing user info, follower counts, and video list with edit profile support.
frontend/src/pages/TrendingPage.tsx: Trending videos page fetching and displaying ranked trending video cards.
Analyzes audio by sampling amplitude windows and returning an array of volume values.
frontend/src/utils/editor/audioMixing.ts: Combines original video audio with music and voiceover using Web Audio API, applying effects when needed.
frontend/src/utils/editor/renderPipeline: Renders edited video frames with filters, effects, captions, stickers, and mixes audio before exporting.
frontend/src/utils/editor/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for editor state including filters, effects, captions, stickers, and audio settings.
frontend/src/utils/editor/videoProcessin: Provides functions to apply pixel-level video filters and canvas-based visual effects to frames using CanvasRenderingContext2D.
frontend/src/utils/editor/voiceEffects.t: Applies pitch and filter-based voice effects by rendering audio through an OfflineAudioContext.
frontend/src/utils/haptics.ts: Triggers simple vibration patterns based on light, medium, or heavy intensity.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Generates shareable video URLs and handles sharing via Web Share API or clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, animations, typography, and container settings with theme variables.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, and requirements for the ZIZO app, including preloader behavior notes.
